news.description:
The Dead by Daylight team would like your feedback in a PTB survey.

We encourage you to be as honest as possible in letting us know how you feel about the build. The information and answers provided are anonymous, not shared with any third-party, and will not be used for purposes other than survey analysis.

Access the survey HERE!
news.title: PTB SURVEY

news.description:
People of The Fog,

Thank you for participating in the Player Test Build!

Here’s a few things to know about your save data & progress in the Player Test Build:
  • Your personal profile (save data, inventory, currencies) has been copied from the Live servers to the PTB servers on August 13th, 2020 at 12:15 AM EST. Any progress or purchases made on the Live servers after this date will not be reflected on the PTB.
  • All progress made during the PTB will not be transferred over to the Live servers.

    • You can leave feedback of your experience here:
    https://forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/categories/4-2-0-ptb-feedback
    See you in The Fog.

    -The Dead by Daylight team
news.title: PTB - Save Game & Progress

news.description:
Welcome to the Public Test Build for Chapter 17! Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you'll find during this PTB.

For a full list of patch notes, click HERE.

NEW CHAPTER
  • Added new characters: The Blight (Killer) and Felix Richter (Survivor)


    • FEATURES & CONTENT
  • Visual updates of common in-game objects: Generators, Pallets, Lockers, and Chests
  • Visual updates & breakable walls added to some realms: Springwood & Yamaoka Estate
    • Appearance rate of these realms is increased for the first week of PTB
  • Added new Offerings affecting Realm, Basement, and Hatch spawns


    • KNOWN ISSUES
  • Disturbed Ward map - Disabled on PTB due to an existing bug.
  • The Nightmare - Issue with lighting in the Yamaoka Estate and Springwood realms when using The Nightmare as the killer. Please refrain from using him during the PTB to avoid this.
news.title: CHAPTER 17 PTB
